Reaction parsers (parsers.py)¶

This module has code related to parsing reactions.

class parsers.ExpressionParser¶

A base class to derive from. Derived children of this class ideally implement methods to parse individual reaction ‘sources’

class parsers.StringExpressionParser¶

An implementation of ExpressionParser for reading strings and forming

classmethod check_symbol_name(symbol)¶

Checks that a species symbol follows our formatting rules

Parameters:symbol – a string
Returns:None
classmethod parse(expression_str)¶

This function parses an expression given in our defined syntax. This includes the reaction string and the rate constants for the forward and reverse directions

Parameters:expression_str – a formatted string which gives the reaction
Returns:a 5-ple giving 1) a list of Reactant instances, 2) a list of Product instances, 3) a forward rate constant (float), 4) a reverse rate constant (float), and 5) a boolean indicating whether the reaction occurs in both directions.
